amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete $9.4 million provided for TV Marti and make a small addition to the U.S. Marshals Service fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to eliminate the $9.4 million funding for TV Marti.

action.text: On agreeing to the Skaggs amendment (A003) as amended Failed by recorded vote: 172 - 251 (Roll No. 382).
